DESCRIPTION_BLACKLIST:
List of items that are not allowed in the chute.

The items' name should be separated by a comma (,).
You can edit the config directly in the file for a better experience.
DESCRIPTION_SPAWN_DELAY: Time in seconds between each item spawn.
DESCRIPTION_REQUIRE_IN_ORBIT: Prevents players from putting items inside the chute when the ship is on a planet.
DESCRIPTION_STOP_AFTER:
Limits the amount of items that can be spawned inside the chute.

This is to prevent further lag when retrieve too many items.
DESCRIPTION_CHUTE_PERMISSION: Allows certain employees to store items in the chute.
DESCRIPTION_AS_SAFE: Prevents the ship's inventory from clearing when all players die.
DESCRIPTION_MAX_ITEM_COUNT:
Limits the amount of items that can be inside the ship's inventory.

If the ship's inventory already has too many items, it won't empty the excess.
DESCRIPTION_PERSIST_THROUGH_FIRE: Prevents the ship's inventory from clearing when the crew gets fired.
DESCRIPTION_INVENTORY_PERMISSION: Allows certain employees to retrieve items from the inventory.
DESCRIPTION_SHOW_CONFIRMATION: Removes the confirmation when retrieving items.
DESCRIPTION_YES_PLEASE: Automatically places the cursor on the 'YES' option when retrieving items.
DESCRIPTION_SHOW_TRADEMARK: Determines if the mod shows the company's trademark in the terminal.
DESCRIPTION_NO_STEAM_ID: Replaces the ID shown on the ship's inventory menu by a random ID.
SINGLE_RETRIEVE_MESSAGE: Select the desired item to retrieve it.

TYPE_RETRIEVE_MESSAGE: Select the desired type to retrieve all the items of this type.
TEXT_ALL_RETRIEVE: You are about to retrieve everything (${0}).
